pattern: ERROR: cli Error: World state trees are out of sync, please delete your data directory and re-sync
message: World state trees are out of sync - node needs resync
solution:
1. Stop the node container. Use option 13
2. Delete data from the folder: sudo rm -rf /root/.aztec/testnet/data/
3. Run the container. Use option 14

1. Stop node
2. Remove database files
3. Restart node

pattern: ERROR: sequencer Error building/enqueuing block: InsufficientFundsError
message: Insufficient funds for gas * price + value
solution: Fill funds in the publisher address

pattern: ERROR: sequencer Error in running promise: Error: Failed to find an available publisher
message: Failed to find an available publisher
solution: Put private key for publisher in keystore.json

pattern: ERROR: world-state:database Call SYNC_BLOCK failed: Error: Can't synch block: block state does not match world state
message: Can't sync block: block state does not match world state
solution: Restart the Aztec node. If the error persists, delete the /data folder. Typically, the path is ~/.aztec/name_of_testnet/data

pattern: ERROR: world-state:database Call SYNC_BLOCK failed: Error: Can't sync block: block state does not match world state
message: Can't sync block: block state does not match world state
solution: Restart the Aztec node. If the error persists, delete the /data folder. Typically, the path is ~/.aztec/name_of_testnet/data

pattern: WARN: node:blob-sink:client Failed to fetch blobs
message: Failed to fetch blobs from BEACON. Sync wÄ±ll not complete!
solution:
1. Delete the /data folder. Typically, the path is ~/.aztec/name_of_testnet/data.
2. Restart the Aztec node.
3. If the error persists, check or change your BEACON RPC!

pattern: ERROR: cli Error in command execution
message: Cli Error in command execution - Your node cannot start!
solution: Please check and copy error log. Send it to Aztec help channel in Discord

pattern: ERROR: cli KeystoreError: Duplicate attester address found
message: Cli Error in command execution - Duplicate attester address found
solution:
1. Go to the key storage folder /root/aztec/config/ 
2. Delete the bls-filtered-pk.json file from there. 
3. Stop and Start node container
